item.title: 在北卡罗来纳州达勒姆 40 号州际公路某处神秘失踪后，一只 100 岁的巨鳄鳄龟在逃。
item.description:
A 100-year-old giant alligator snapping turtle is at large after mysteriously disappearing somewhere along Interstate 40 in Durham, North Carolina. https://t.co/KdXF45wU67 pic.twitter.com/bzY8lEusNP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据卫生官员称，一名新墨西哥州男子死于鼠疫，这是自 2020 年以来该州首次有人死于鼠疫。
item.description:
A New Mexico man has died from plague in the state's first human fatality from the disease since 2020, according to health officials. https://t.co/VKKjs0nLzg pic.twitter.com/R5YM6wsEAp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 第四季度亏损后，Dollar Tree 和 Family Dollar 将关闭 1,000 家门店。
item.description:
Dollar Tree and Family Dollar will close 1,000 stores following fourth-quarter loss. https://t.co/AMXM9aZ4Fq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）表示，她与民主党同僚鲍勃-凯西（Bob Casey）共同发起的一项新法案将授权联邦贸易委员会对涉及 "通货紧缩 "的公司进行打击。
item.description:
Sen. Elizabeth Warren says a new bill she is co-sponsoring with fellow Democrat Bob Casey would empower the Federal Trade Commission to go after companies involved in "shrinkflation." https://t.co/gWtce9WGgm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 五年来，阿拉斯加一年一度的艾迪塔罗德比赛一直在顺利进行，并没有引起太多争议。今年，三只狗在比赛中死亡，另有五只狗在训练中死亡，这引起了人们对这项运动的道德关注。
item.description:
For five years, Alaska's annual Iditarod has gone on without much controversy. This year, the deaths of three dogs during the race — and five more during training — have raised ethical concerns about the sport.https://t.co/fIsIlSW0yl pic.twitter.com/OSmM1MW9FA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 根据俄克拉荷马州首席法医办公室周三公布的尸检报告，俄克拉荷马州少年奈克斯特-本尼迪克特死于自杀。
item.description:
Oklahoma teen Nex Benedict died by suicide, according to an autopsy report released Wednesday by the state's Office of the Chief Medical Examiner. https://t.co/6NUeM7Isx3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 女演员兼模特克里斯蒂-布林克莉（Christie Brinkley）在 Instagram 上发布了她手术后的恢复照片，透露她被诊断出患有基底细胞癌（一种常见的皮肤癌）。
item.description:
Actress and model Christie Brinkley revealed she has been diagnosed with basal cell carcinoma, a common form of skin cancer, in an Instagram post featuring photos of her recovery from surgery.https://t.co/Pt2UreDZ08 pic.twitter.com/hliQv6G2JV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案中为前总统特朗普 9200 万美元保证金提供担保的公司首席执行官在致投资者的一封信中谈到了他们的参与情况。
item.description:
The CEO of the company that guaranteed former Pres. Trump's $92 million bond in the E. Jean Carroll defamation case addressed their participation in a letter to investors. https://t.co/S1Zbxz8THT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据法庭文件显示，一名 19 岁的学生飞行员因涉嫌多次试图进入阿拉斯加航空公司一架航班的驾驶舱而面临联邦指控。
item.description:
A 19-year-old student pilot is facing a federal charge over allegedly attempting to enter the cockpit of an Alaska Airlines flight multiple times, according to court documents. https://t.co/42FQ9aMIQc pic.twitter.com/EoUFkXN4GX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 女演员兼模特克里斯蒂-布林克莉（Christie Brinkley）在 Instagram 上发布了她手术后的恢复照片，透露她被诊断出患有基底细胞癌（一种常见的皮肤癌）。

item.title: 特别是自 12 月底以来，威廉王子的妻子凯特完全没有出现在公众视线中，这在网上引发了一场阴谋论的漩涡，从秘密怀孕或离婚到身体或精神崩溃，不一而足。
item.description:
The complete absence of Kate, the wife of Prince William, from the public eye since late December, in particular, has led to a swirl of conspiracy theories online ranging from a secret pregnancy or divorce to physical or mental health breakdowns. https://t.co/1ng14hcM90

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: "我简直不敢相信这是真的！"佛罗里达州当局称，这名警长在一次交通拦截中被一只 "恼羞成怒 "的火鸡接近后，"激怒了一些人"。
item.description:
"I can't believe this is happening!"

Authorities in Florida say this sheriff's deputy "ruffled a few feathers" after being approached by an "irritated" turkey during a traffic stop.

The sheriff's department says the deputy eventually managed to safely complete the traffic stop. pic.twitter.com/Q7lE4Am73I

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 在海地不断升级的动乱中，美国部署了一支精锐的海军陆战队，为美国驻太子港大使馆提供安全保障。内乱导致海地代总理阿里尔-亨利宣布辞职。@MattRiversABC 报道。
item.description:
Amid spiraling chaos in Haiti, the U.S. deployed an elite group of Marines to provide security at the U.S. embassy in Port-au-Prince. The civil unrest led to acting Haitian Prime Minister Ariel Henry announcing he would resign. @MattRiversABC reports. https://t.co/6DNaNcDa4t pic.twitter.com/E5eTM3kw9x

— World News Tonight (@ABCWorldNews) March 14, 2024

item.title: 凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）对斯嘉丽-约翰逊（Scarlett Johansson）的 "SNL "印象作出反应，并对她在厨房餐桌上回应拜登总统国情咨文演讲的批评作出反应。
item.description:
Katie Britt reacts to Scarlett Johansson's 'SNL' impression, criticism of her kitchen table response to Pres. Biden's State of Union address. https://t.co/otN6ooX2aJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 监控录像显示，失踪大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）失踪当晚在纳什维尔人行道上蹒跚而行。
item.description:
Missing college student Riley Strain seen on surveillance video stumbling on Nashville sidewalk night he vanished. https://t.co/R2CVpAR4Rm

item.title: 一部新的纪录片聚焦于 20 世纪 90 年代和 21 世纪初一些最受欢迎的 Nickelodeon 儿童节目的幕后故事。
item.description:
A new documentary focuses on what some claim went on behind the scenes at some of the most popular Nickelodeon children's shows of the 1990s and early 2000s. https://t.co/b5bd9ocTxS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 阿迪达斯称，去年 Yeezy 鞋的销售额已为打击反犹太主义和其他形式仇恨的团体捐赠或计划捐赠超过 1.5 亿美元。
item.description:
Adidas says it’s donated or is planning to give away more than $150 million to groups fighting antisemitism and other forms of hate from the sales of Yeezy shoes last year. https://t.co/oJMZGctH3V

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据称是吉尔戈海滩连环杀手雷克斯-赫尔曼（Rex Heuermann）的分居妻子在周三的一份新声明中称，她的丈夫 "不可能犯下他被指控的罪行"。
item.description:
The estranged wife of alleged Gilgo Beach serial killer Rex Heuermann maintains that her husband is "not capable of the crimes he is accused of," her attorney said in a new statement on Wednesday. https://t.co/al9hm8lpa2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据检察官称，两名男子涉嫌炸毁一名妇女的住宅，并计划将 "一条大蟒蛇放进受害人家中吃掉受害人的女儿"，因此受到指控：
item.description:
Two men have been charged after allegedly bombing a woman’s home and planning to release “a large python into the victim’s home to eat the victim’s daughter,” according to prosecutors.

Read more: https://t.co/SwyGuknfRH pic.twitter.com/FMpGR5mQRy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 25 岁的杰斯说，在确诊癌症后，他感到非常震惊，决定在社交媒体上记录自己的抗癌历程，以帮助人们提高对癌症的认识。
item.description:
After the shock of his diagnosis, 25-year-old Jace said he decided to document his cancer journey on social media to help raise awareness. https://t.co/39VpG9IRp5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 周日清晨，一名警长在纽约巴达维亚唐斯博彩酒店（Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel）制止一起纠纷时遇袭身亡，当局称已逮捕两人。
item.description:
Two arrests have been made following the death of a sheriff's sergeant who was attacked and killed after breaking up a dispute early Sunday morning at New York’s Batavia Downs Gaming & Hotel, authorities say. https://t.co/adsb6jMN0D

— ABC News (@ABC) March 14, 2024

item.title: 明天：@GMA 独家报道：7 岁女孩在佛罗里达海滩被沙子掩埋后死亡，其父母向 @eriellereshef 表示："当我们去海滩时，我们会想到水上安全。我从来没有想过这件事"。他们希望其他父母知道的事情以及更多。
item.description:
TOMORROW: A @GMA EXCLUSIVE: Parents of 7-year-old girl who died after getting buried in sand at Florida beach speak out to @eriellereshef: ”When we go to the beach, we think of water safety. And this never, ever once crossed my mind." What they want other parents to know & more. pic.twitter.com/MCvj10LXp7

— Good Morning America (@GMA) March 14, 2024

item.title: 雷吉娜-金（Regina King）在 @GMA 节目中首次谈及儿子的死因，她在采访中动情地告诉罗宾-罗伯茨 "悲伤是一段旅程"。
item.description:
TOMORROW ON @GMA: Regina King speaks out for the first time on her son’s death, telling Robin Roberts in the moving interview “grief is a journey.” https://t.co/uhJyMvEw7U

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿肯色州官员本周宣布，将不再允许阿肯色州居民在州身份证上使用性别标记--以前是用 X 标记。
item.description:
Arkansas residents will no longer be allowed to use gender markers on their state identifications cards – previously noted with an X, state officials announced this week. https://t.co/9ZOCG5d3Ie

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在加利福尼亚州，10 岁的马儿娜拉掉进了一条壕沟，需要救援人员的帮助才能重新出来。现场的兽医人员宣布，在成功营救之后，娜拉健康无恙。
item.description:
After falling into a trench in California, 10-year-old horse Nala needed the help of a rescue crew to get back out.

Veterinary staff at the scene declared she was healthy and unharmed after the successful rescue operation. https://t.co/cWJf37WjJ4 pic.twitter.com/gS1yXXDyub

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 白宫新闻发言人卡琳-让-皮埃尔（Karine Jean-Pierre）周二被问及白宫是否曾对照片进行过数字篡改。"你是在拿我们和英国的情况作比较吗？"让-皮埃尔说，"不，我们这里不做这种事。
item.description:
White House press sec. Karine Jean-Pierre was asked on Tuesday whether the White House had ever digitally altered photos.

"Are you comparing us to what's going on in the UK?" said Jean-Pierre, adding, "No, that is not something we do here." https://t.co/TO8PiKo1SS pic.twitter.com/fJbh70qS2d

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 从本周开始，美国海军陆战队中的女性将不再需要在穿制服裙时穿连裤袜，这是自 1948 年女性成为海军陆战队永久成员以来的第一次。
item.description:
Beginning this week, women in the U.S. Marines Corps will no longer be required to wear pantyhose with their uniform skirts, a first since women became a permanent part of the Marine Corps in 1948. https://t.co/8JsmLxsz5Q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在 11 月大选之前，国会山关于 TikTok 的争论正在产生奇怪的关系，模糊了意识形态的界限。
item.description:
The debate raging on Capitol Hill over TikTok is creating strange bedfellows and blurring ideological lines ahead of the November election. https://t.co/s4GNdFAHrK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普预计将于周四出庭，届时他的律师将为其联邦机密文件案的驳回进行辩护。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump is expected to be in the courtroom on Thursday when his attorneys argue for the dismissal of his federal classified documents case. https://t.co/vQ8QcSBCSf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 13, 2024
